StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to much more room for everything else.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMassiveScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Massive Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're building some of the largest ships this galaxy has ever seen, capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Master shipwrights

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Maximization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose. Your choice.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullStrengthening_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Strengthening

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tougher hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can be used to conduct partial repairs to them as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSelfHealingHulls_Name
StringTable.String: Self Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything so long as you don't ask too many questions about them. By installing nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases, our ships will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierTech_Name
StringTable.String: Carriers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drones

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tough little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end; and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighCapacityCarriers_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Carriers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high-capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters - designed to be more compact and packable - along with more efficient repair, reloading, and recovery facilities, we've been able to greatly improve the carrying capacity of our carriers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship; it's another thing to keep it running. Whether it's keeping it supplied with fuel, ammunition, or people, there is an awful lot going on behind the scenes to keep a deep-space vessel operational. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a little more practice moving assets around in space, and figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases mining production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: An asteroid mining operation is an incredibly complicated ballet of activity, as boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarm about an asteroid. Keeping all these pieces moving and operational is a challenging task, and improving the organization of a mining operation is a sure way to improve its output.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Shipyards

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shipyard decay rate.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs we have ever created. Any improvements we can make to their management and operations will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well, the part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics that is.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarMining_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We couldn't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for most things actually. Basically, improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization, or at least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEfficiencyMining_Name
StringTable.String: High Efficiency Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mining operations have gotten better still, increasing the total amount of resources we're capable of generating, while losing less miners than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianResourceExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Resource Extraction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Valuable minerals and resources can be found in the crust of most planets in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface while cracking rock to collect the goodies within.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLosslessMining_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. The rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about what we might find in the galaxy. Or who. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against some yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Name
StringTable.String: Miniturization Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Name
StringTable.String: Production Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether energy, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of them all at one place.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage potential of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're more so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a columnated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Amplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: For a long time the manufacture of beam weapons was as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually polish and tune each weapon. By making concentrated efforts to standardize beam weapon manufacturing, we're finally able to automate portions of it, reducing the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons has always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. With the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to a breakthrough in containment technology, we're now able to generate columnated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Beam Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far less resources.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction, making it effective against even the highest density armor. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe, so feel free to continue deploying it as you see fit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons use a variety of systems to accumulate energy prior to the weapon firing. We've found that the capacity of these energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which although expensive, allows for increased beam output. Most interestingly, such fields can be theoretically projected at great distances, potentially improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that our beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields, or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam output. Our beam weapons have that funny smell again, but we don't hear many crew members complaining.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. The latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest downsides to missile-based technology is that much of the energy is expended on the outer surface of enemy vessels. By including with our warheads a device which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing their destructive potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Missile Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Modeling of the subatomic interactions our warheads make upon detonation against various hull and shield systems has revealed the possibility of making lighter, more efficient warheads.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedos

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor-piercing technology with our latest antimatter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe until the moment of impact, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare torpedo's at.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship- or starbase-based sensor systems which can improve the tracking, and ultimately the range, of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of overwhelming and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our fleet-based guidance systems, along with the latest generation of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, will allow for even more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extention

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantities, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply-chain problems. But supply has finally ramped up to meet demand, and we should see cost savings across all associated kinetic weapons programs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experimentation with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Research efforts to emit tight clusters of particles at rapid velocities has led to a weapon which gets around some of the practical limitations of slug-based mass drivers. Called pulse cannons, they have similar tactical characteristics as previous generations of kinetic weapons. They're just much more powerful.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Frictionless Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconductors have enabled us to deliver energy to our weapon systems much more rapidly. The trade off is smaller projectiles, though as they'll be launched at higher velocities, the destructive potential will be similar, and the weapons will have a much longer effective range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils, and their less-strenuous cooling requirements, make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. So feel free to cram more of them into whatever you're cramming them into.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By synthesizing and launching pulses of gravitons at the enemy, we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of the ship systems they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy. Before they die.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Accelerator Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons and are approaching the limits of the field, making them as mass efficient as theoretically possible.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro-singularities that collapse out of existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. Our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Militarization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can now be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Training

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military's regular training exercises are beginning to pay off, and we can now expect our soldiers to be far more effective when conducting ground-based operations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Fortifications

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't assume that our space-based defenses will always be effective. Hardening our ground fortifications and preparing plans for rapidly forming colonist militias will make our worlds significantly more secure.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Resistance Forces

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies' ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. We are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Bombardment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows planetary bombardment to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows informational warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal, but by using EMP's and targeted hacking attacks, we can cripple an enemy's coordination abilities, dramatically limiting the effectiveness of their defenses. If they want to keep fighting after that, then it can get visceral.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Biological Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows biological warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest with ourselves: If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to be nice about it. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of our actions, but at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStallerMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Core Detonation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any defenders. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAdvancedInvasionTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Invasion Tactics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Fortification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Bombardment Shelters

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies immune to planetary bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By moving our most critical structures underground and providing similar shelters for civilians and troops, we can dramatically limit the effectiveness of most forms of orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Systems Hardening

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies immune to information warfare.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive experts have identified a number of vulnerabilities in our ground-based C&C systems, and urgently recommend that we harden them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Vaccinations

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies immune to biological warfare.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to predict the form of biological attack an alien invader could inflict upon us, making it impossible to conventionally vaccinate against. Thus we've developed adaptive vaccines, which are engineered viruses that cycle through a number of semi-random stages in an attempt to expose a body's immune system to as broad a range of infection types as possible.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalDefencePlatform_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the pressure off of our starbases in orbit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetaryDefenseDome_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense Dome

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Planetary Defense Dome and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a defensive dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval officers are notoriously squishy and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to try, otherwise the squishy officers will stop getting into the ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard; and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing systems a bit cheaper to build.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though a surprisingly effective one.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of armor.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be their most common. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generations of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shielding technology, the so called Barrier Field, provides a number of improvements over previous systems. Now capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it, this dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: After the first few prototypes went out the door, we've been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of our Barrier Field systems, reducing the cost of shield components.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shield Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our troops to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser, our engineers now claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields, but those would be some pretty terrifying weapons. Even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment shields at a distance. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: An array of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles, point defense systems are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, which should make them more effective.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor and tracking equipment our point defense systems use are fairly specialized pieces of equipment that were initially quite rare and costly. Now that we've dedicated a lot of effort to building point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large and were limited by the fact that we could only build railguns so small. Now that we can build more compact railguns, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By deploying electronic countermeasures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Hard to confuse a laser.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always a generational game of leap frog being played between missile designers and ECM designers, but we believe our latest algorithms have given us the leg up on the bad guys this time.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at ECM suites were heavily customizable, requiring a great deal of fine tuning to perform well. Now that we know what works, we can automate much more of the manufacturing and installation process.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first ECM suites were cobbled together from a half dozen different processors and transmitters. We've since streamlined those into a single unit which weighs much less.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSentrySystems_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Sentry Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Point Defense Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: To be fair, only a few of our drone systems have ever actually shot each other in combat situations. But by minimizing that just a little more, we should be able to make our point defenses a little more cost effective, albeit less funny.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we realized point defense drones don't need much personal space, we were able to start packing them in a lot tighter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArreonMissileDefenseTech_Name
StringTable.String: Arreon Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones, armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe, capable of filling the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseSupportSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long-range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Wide-area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing countermeasures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to entire fleets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of point defense technologies has led to the development of fleet-wide drone systems. Additionally, our fleets can now be equipped with point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-countermeasure, which should greatly boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By its very nature, armor is always going to be a fairly mass-intensive way of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDurantiumCompositeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Composite

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Experiments have revealed that when certain materials are stacked in specific arrangements, they have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors when exposed to compressive forces, greatly magnifying their damage absorption potential. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Lamination

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful study of some battle-damaged ships has revealed previously unknown weaknesses in our armor systems. Basically, we know why some of them were cracking in half now. We'll do something about that right away.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If the troops ask, it's not that our armor is now cheap. It's that we've found a more efficient way of manufacturing it. But yes, it is pretty cheap.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the arrangement of our Durantium composites has revealed that we can get away with slightly less dense materials at certain layers with no impact to the armor's effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKanviumLaminateTech_Name
StringTable.String: Kanvium Laminate

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor systems use a new type of lamination which, upon impact, causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize, deforming to absorb energy in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, increasing the effectiveness of the armor. After the impact, the armor flows back into its original shape, minimizing the risk posed by repeat hits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Armorers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: With modern armoring systems, the design of the armor informs the shape of the ship as much as the other way around; properly armoring a ship is a complicated trade off between armorer and ship designer. It's an art essentially, and it's one that we have mastered.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've created and shredded countless generations of armor, and worn out entire test ranges with our target practice. On a weight basis, our armor systems are now as efficient as they can possibly be.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianZeroPointArmorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Point Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a hard time proving zero point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The fields that we use to generate hardening effects at a distance have 27 different "poles" which can be cycled repeatedly through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material; generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIntegrityFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Integrity Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can now induce material fluidization and shape recovery effects as well. These new Integrity Fields can make every ship in a fleet invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Communications

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of communications technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. This presents an incredible danger to us, but also perhaps an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Reasoning

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our increased exposure to alien cultures has given us the opportunity to simulate several different rhetorical and diplomatic approaches when dealing with them, revealing several ways to improve their attitudes towards us. Our role-playing has enabled us to talk prettier, essentially.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Influential Voice

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our culture has a way of communicating what our diplomats cannot, and by increasing the ease with which other civilizations can access our culture, we can win hearts and minds before we even get to the negotiating table.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Communicator

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The way we see the universe doesn't have to be unique to us. By clearly communicating our thinking to outside parties, they may begin seeing same way as us, and even help make this the universe that we want to see.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Steller Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization whose distant outposts are many weeks of travel away isn't a new challenge for us, paralleling our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. But it's a field we're having to refamiliarize ourselves with pretty quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in one of our harbors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Federalist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Federalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Federalist method of organization features a relatively weak central government with much of the power and responsibility offloaded to lower, more local governmental groups. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Populist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Populist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist forms of government are designed to make people happy, albeit at the cost of having the most effective policies. As a side-effect of this relentless interest in pleasing others, Populist governments are often very good at diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Universalist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Universalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people. In a galaxy-spanning civilization, that can be a lot of people, none of whom agree on anything. Still, a balanced approach like this at least ensures a government has no weak spots.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance
