StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and more trite political slogans.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Industrialist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Industrialist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist governments seek to maximize industrial capacity by rewarding citizens based entirely on their productivity. From top to bottom, society is organized to encourage hard work and not having fun.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Mercantile Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Mercantile Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercantilists seek to ensure their civilization's prosperity through trade, careful negotiations, hard-earned intelligence, or brutally unfair tariffs. The exposure their traders have with other civilizations also gives them a unique advantage at espionage.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Technologist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Technologist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Technologists understand that throughout history, any time two civilizations have met, the less technologically advanced one has come out very poorly from the encounter. By dedicating all their effort and resources to R & D, Technologists hope to never be that dumber civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Democracy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has been one of the crowning achievements of political theory. Adapting it to a galaxy-spanning civilization has posed a number of challenges - the campaign trail is now rather long - but the increase in public satisfaction and market certainty will certainly be worth it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: War Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of War Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's because they consider all other civilizations to be inferior, or are simply terrified of them, the War Party is willing to put their entire civilization on a military footing to do something about it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Pacifist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Pacifist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pacifist governments forego the language of aggression and militarization, and focus all their efforts on promoting culture and social welfare. This makes them well liked in the galactic community, and their words travel far.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space-based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The potential for profit that an alliance with our neighbors could bring is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Treaty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of economic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activities. When well designed, these treaties should result in increased wealth for both parties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Treaty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of cultural treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the interchange of cultural products and making it easier for civilians to cross borders, we can hope to increase the influence we have on our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Treaty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of research treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By entering into formal information sharing agreements with other civilizations, our researchers can more easily accumulate the masses of data which modern research often requires.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarAlliances_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Alliances

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: The process of turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate one. There's only one way those talks can go right, and a thousand different ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Alliance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of military alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By forming formal military alliances with our friends, our civilization will be that much more imposing to our enemies. The trade-off is that we now risk being drawn into wars not of our own choosing. Friends are cheap to have, but allies can be very expensive indeed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Alliance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of technological alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal technological alliance will dramatically ramp up the research information sharing programs we have with our ally. This is valuable information we're sharing, so we must be sure of their friendship before entering such an agreement.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Alliance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of cultural alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal cultural alliance will lower almost all barriers to the movement of people and ideas across borders with our neighbor. Not only will this bring us closer, we can hope to have a bigger influence on our neighbor's affairs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEminenceTech_Name
StringTable.String: Eminence

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A civilization which takes diplomacy seriously and has a long record of fair-minded dealing will always carry a greater voice at the bargaining table. Our people are building that reputation now, and are stronger for it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMajestyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Majesty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMajestyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of assimilation treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy doesn't just listen to our words, they want to believe them. So sterling is our reputation, that simple gestures by our diplomats can adjust the fate of whole worlds. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Lobbyist

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: To the initiate in intragalactic diplomacy, there's a shocking amount of crude backroom dealing which goes on behind the surface of an organization like the United Planets. But that's how the sausage is made, and we'll do well if we're better at it than our enemies. And our allies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianUnitedPlanetsClout_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Clout

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: Our allies have long been convinced of the benefits of our friendship. Now they see the benefit of our wisdom and leadership. We carry a lot more weight in the United Planets now, deservedly so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: Winning the hearts and minds of both our people and our neighbors will make almost every aspect of running this civilization easier. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Representation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our culture has made inroads on the planets of our neighbors, we can help cement this influence by encouraging our biggest stars to regularly visit and vacation there, serving as ambassadors for our way of life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists and dreamers who serve as our cultural ambassadors aren't naturally inclined towards thinking about money, after we locked a few of them in a room with an accountant for a bit, they managed to find a number of ways to do things more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Self Sufficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The facilities we need for our artistic endeavors cost money to maintain, and many of our artists and directors have very expensive tastes indeed. By encouraging them to reuse materials, props, and punchlines, we can reduce the ongoing costs of running these enterprises.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Research-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on research planets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By adapting our cultural products to cast scientists and researchers in a more favorable light, we might find appreciative audiences among the substantial research communities in our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Approval-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which focuses intently on its leaders is a fine thing to have when those leaders are doing a good job. Though when the leaders aren't doing a good job, it's filled with harsh satire and unflattering impressions, so watch out for that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Wealth-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on wealthy planets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If our people have money, let's not make them ashamed of it. By encouraging displays of conspicuous consumption and a culture which celebrates wealth, we can gain a great deal of influence with people living the good life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is seen across the galaxy as a haven for all those who desire a more fulfilling intellectual life. If we make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long since incorporated all the worthy ideas of other cultures into our own, and can now safely say that they serve no purpose other than muddying the waters. By quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals, and even those just trying to pass through, we can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalDomination_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Domination

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or worse, dumb. All sane beings bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalAffinity_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Affinity

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepares the civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Other universes deserve the benefit of seeing the light of our wisdom and culture. Indeed, it is a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Commerce

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic economic buildings. Adds a trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which spans the stars is a pretty complicated beast. We don't need to understand it all, of course, just supply the facilities and light regulations for the free market to get to work doing what it does best.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Wealthy Population

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases wealth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With targeted tax rates, we can encourage a number of different areas of our economy. A tax policy which favor business and investment should ultimately lead to a wealthier economy, for example.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Supportive Population

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By targeting economic policy to support workers and the civilian population in general, we can ensure we have a much broader base of approval to build our civilization on.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Designated Trading Partner

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds a trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging and supporting trade is a great way to both bring in extra income and forge closer ties with our neighbors. Everyone's happy when they're making money.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The recent explosion in newly available commodities, combined with the sheer distance between buyers and sellers, has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Banking

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Economy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade route income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which prioritizes external trading will be well suited to exploit the markets of the greater galactic community, or just exploit the greater galactic community in general.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Well Crafted Treaties

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases diplomatic trade income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a certain art in the framing of a treaty, and even in an agreement between equals, one party can be more equal than the other. Let's be that more equal party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Tourism Board

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By reducing the obstacles that foreign tourists might face when trying to visit us, we can encourage more of them to travel here, and more of their money to stay here.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFinancialSectorsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Financial Sectors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated financial sectors should help facilitate the flow of capital across our civilization, which will result in more things being built in the places they need to. Wealth creation, in other words, which we can tap for a variety of purposes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticStockMarket_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Stock Market

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Stock exchanges have proven remarkably elusive to establish in this galaxy, and only the most recent advances in communications technology and regulatory capability have made them possible.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Trade

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Exchanging goods with our neighbors will theoretically enrich us both, and is worth pursuing for that reason alone. Also, if we play it smart, it can enrich us a lot more than the other guy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade route optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the overall value of trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Expanded Trade

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is to establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our resources enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Trade

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing fixed trading hubs and encouraging the markets which develop around them, we stand to profit handsomely. The wealth of the entire galactic community will flow through our hands. Our ever so slightly sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tariff Stations

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their area of effect.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff station on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Route Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes means more trade income. Sometimes it's best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticFacilitation_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Facilitation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer volume of goods that pass through a trading port is staggering. We've needed to develop a number of new pieces of equipment and organizational techniques for managing the flow of goods smoothly and safely. We've had a few too many large masses make dock workers very, very flat, to not reevaluate our procedures.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Masters

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the best - really, the only place to buy and sell goods. Of course, certain advantages accrue to the owner of such a monopoly.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoEntertainment_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Entertainment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: With out the approval of our people, we won't be able to accomplish very much. Distracting them with various amusements is perhaps a cynical ploy, but it might be easier than trying to treat them as the rational beings they're so often not.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Tourism

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only can we entertain and distract our own citizens with amusements, we can begin luring friendly visitors from our galactic neighbors. This will help improve relations, and at minimum, result in some extra income for us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorSole_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Sole

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorSole_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Dream Conclave Achievement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorSole_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors taught us that the study of the universe is the key to happiness, and will lead us to greater things, some of them helpful.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPopulationDiversion_Name
StringTable.String: Population Diversion

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPopulationDiversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPopulationDiversion_Dec
StringTable.String: More amusements! Bigger amusements! Our people are at heart dreadfully simple, which is distressing on some level, even if it does make them pretty easy to manage.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Easy to Please

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy: With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Easily Distracted

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building entertainment improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Eager to Please

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the maintenance required by entertainment improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSuperiorRecreation_Name
StringTable.String: Superior Recreation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSuperiorRecreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSuperiorRecreation_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero gravity beaches are a tough concept to wrap your head around, though that hasn't stopped them from becoming insanely popular. Even if they do get in your hair and teeth a lot more than the regular kind.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianContentmentTech_Name
StringTable.String: Contentment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianContentmentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianContentmentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that the answer we were looking for this whole time was simply injecting happiness directly into the base of the skull. Our new virtual worlds offer anything a person could desire, at a fraction of the cost of actually giving it to them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticCruseLines_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Cruise Lines

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: It's actually surprising that for the amount of time our citizens spend in space, very little of it is done for pleasure. Now, to be fair, that's mainly because space is incredibly boring and also still a bit deadly. But if we were to spruce it up a bit, there might be some tourism income in there for us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWondersoftheGalaxy_Name
StringTable.String: Wonders of the Galaxy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The galactic community is beginning to realize just how awesome we are, and if they aren't, we'll soon be airing targeted advertisements which tell them to. The expected increase in tourism revenue is anticipated to be very nice indeed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPilgrimageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pilgrimage

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There's not a single intelligent being in this galaxy that doesn't want to make a visit to our fair civilization, and for many of them, it's a religious requirement. Our home has become the most important destination that intelligent life has ever known.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIndustrialSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: It only took a few horrific accidents for us to finally come to grips with the challenges of off-world industry, and now that we have, we've identified a number of ways we can begin improving and specializing our industrial capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianConstructionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Construction Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Seemingly small improvements can have a big effect when applied to large projects, and we're working on some very large projects now indeed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianManufacturingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no getting around it: "Incremental improvements in manufacturing techniques" isn't much of a headline. Which is a shame, considering the benefit we expect to see from them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIndustrialMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: If it can be dreamed up, we can build it. Indeed, many of our economists now believe that the limiting factor of our industrial capacity is our own imaginations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMolecularSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMolecularSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: What we can do with Molecular Fabrication is amazing, particularly if we specialize.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianResearchOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Research Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Researchers are great at inventing things, but surprisingly bad at the business of inventing things. A number of inefficient practices have developed which we should be able to streamline.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTechnologicalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The lab equipment needed to research some of these new fields is incredibly expensive and esoteric. Specializing our research efforts will be necessary to make the biggest advances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've made great strides with our colonization techniques in the past few years, and can now begin considering specific areas we'd like to improve upon.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAgriculturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our farming processes will lead to a number of benefits which will help our civilization for a very long time. Until people stop needing food, really.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFarmingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Farming Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Although all this attention we pay to improving our farming techniques sometimes make our farmers uncomfortable - they do get set in their ways - the improvements to our food production capacity are too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAgriculturalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farms now provide an almost unlimited bounty, the food doing much of the hard work itself. The first time you see a plant or animal self-harvest is a little grim though, and school field trips have gotten harder.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnvironmentOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Environment Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've reached the stage where we can optimize our program of environmental modifications to suit specific civil programs. Good news for us, and the environment doesn't seem to be complaining much yet either.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianColonizationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Mastering living on an Extreme world will make life there a lot more tolerable for the poor fools who volunteered for it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBiospherePerfection_Name
StringTable.String: Biosphere Perfection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our colonists die without cause. Even the deadliest of planets are now perfectly survivable to us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a bit of experience sending ships out into the darkness and having most of them come back, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our equipment and navigational techniques.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIonOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've seen them in widescale use, we've identified a number of ways we can make our new Ion Drive systems more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarpFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warp field technology is incredibly complicated, and has in more than a few cases caused a researcher's brains to melt a little bit. But now that we have some experience working with them, we've identified a number of ways to improve their design.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHyperwarpMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships are the envy of the galaxy and our engineers heralded as heroes wherever they go. Fortunately they don't like going out much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSensorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A concentrated effort to optimize our sensor systems could lead to a number of different improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As is usually the case when equipment is sent to the field, the technicians who actually use it soon came up with a number of different ways to improve its efficiency and effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSensorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't anticipate any further increases in the viewing range of our sensors, not until we leave this universe for another one. But we can certainly make them a little more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorRelicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Having captured a few Precursor relics now, and observed the impact they have on our research and culture, we can now try adjusting our Precursor studies to benefit specific areas of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLifeSupportOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Everyone in the navy is very excited that we're trying to optimize our life support systems, and would certainly cheer if they weren't conserving their air.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSupportFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our early attempts at building field-based life support systems left behind many messes and many possible opportunities for improvement, which we're starting to identify now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLifeSupportMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered direct-nutrient injection technologies, and are wringing out a few additional efficiencies to reduce equipment size and cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With the lessons we have learned from our Precursor Traditions, we have been able to find new ways to make our ships superior to all others.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've watched a few construction projects accidentally collapse on themselves in orbit, we've identified a number of possible improvements in our existing construction techniques.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianZeroGravityOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We took a big step forward with our most recent switch to zero-gravity construction practices, and after a few trial runs and one teensy little accident, our engineers have identified a number of areas for improvement.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalConstructionFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Construction Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We're getting better and better at large scale construction with every passing day, and a number of more efficient design practices are beginning to show up on our engineers' drawing tables. Along with the pretty offensive doodles which have always been there.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shipyards are already the envy of the civilized galaxy. But however great they are, they're still capable of more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Carrier Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's nothing like doing something a few times to see how much better it could be. A number of efficiencies in how we conduct our carrier operations have been made clear to us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Logistical Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of space accountants are becoming trained as we speak, capable of finding efficiencies and boring workers in any industry we choose.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating their efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, our researchers believe they can deliver a number of more efficient weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Weapons researchers have to keep pace with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of data returned from the field has revealed a number of inefficiencies which we can begin addressing in the next generation of our beam systems. We may also finally be able to get rid of that funny smell they make too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the limits that physics allow. If we want any more power, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We've spent comparatively little research time on the warhead components of our missile systems, but now that we've turned our attention to the matter, a number of possible efficiencies should be able to be gained with a little effort.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Payload Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Various physical limits of this particular universe prevent us from wringing more destructive potential out of this generation of warheads. But we can certainly make them cheaper and lighter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or even the range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Acceleration Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent advances in superconducting technology should lead to improvements in the critical energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: After several generations of whipping things at other things as fast as possible, our scientists are now really quite good at it. There remain but a few small efficiencies to wring out of the field.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Military Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Administration and oversight is certainly the least glamorous aspect of the military, even though the benefits that they provide are so critical.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Invasion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, but certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitational Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. These are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military theoreticians have analyzed reports of the latest invasion tactics in use in the galaxy and come up with a number of elegant ways to counter them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Tasked with improving the survivability of our naval officers in combat situations, our engineer's first solution: "Don't enter combat situations," was less than helpful. So, after studying the wreckage of a few vessels we've lost in combat, they've come up with a number of possible improvements we can make in our defensive technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier System Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful design review of our initial implementation of the Barrier Field system has revealed a number of possible avenues for further improvements. Who says design reviews are unexciting?

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shielding technology approaches perfection. Our engineers now push the capabilities of our shield systems right to their theoretical limits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Also importantly, less dead naval officers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have some field data on ECM suite performance, we've identified a number of different ways we can improve upon the design and construction of those systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Drone System Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems dramatically increased the sheer volume of our point defense capabilities, so any small improvement in their design we can make should lead to significant cost or weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor systems have increased significantly in complexity. An increased effort to model their behavior under impact should help lead to more effective or efficient designs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of hardening techniques is almost complete and the galaxy trembles at the girth of our vessels. But even perfection can be improved upon it seems. Some more effort should lead to cheaper or more efficient armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The words we use have a limited ability to affect the way we think, and by studying the vocabulary used by our neighbors, we may unlock valuable insights into their mindsets. And possibly even find out how to manipulate them better.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Political Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are several broad ways to organize a government for a space-faring civilization, all of which pose distinct advantages and disadvantages. Rest assured, there's no right choice here; regardless of what you pick, everyone will tell you that you made the wrong choice.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Political Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As we continue to manage (and often mismanage) our affairs, it's become clear that a number of political theories we'd never considered viable before might actually be very relevant indeed when practiced on a galactic scale.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Political Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating the activities and direction of an entire galaxy-wide civilization is tremendously difficult. There's just so many damned people! But thanks to advances in deceit and brain injection technology, we can now put this whole show entirely on a war footing, or, if we choose, the exact opposite.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We profit more from some types of treaties than others, and should begin slanting our diplomatic posture in those directions right away.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Alliance Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Alliances come in a variety of flavors, some of which may be more advantageous to us than others. We should consider our civilization's priorities - and what our new ally is actually good for - before entering such talks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Few works of art and cultural artifacts have broad appeal, and it's often necessary to target one's audience to some extent. By fine tuning the tone and content of our cultural products, we might appeal to demographics which are particularly valuable to us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Commerce Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience managing and regulating markets on an extraplanetary scale, we're now able to target some specific economic improvements that will benefit us in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a better understanding of the quirks of galactic-scale economies, we can begin trimming back the regulations and policies that seem to be causing inefficiencies in specific industries and areas.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading has long been as much an art as a science. By inducing our traders to use just a smidge more science, they might be able to maximize their profits when dealing with certain sectors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a reputation as fair dealers and market makers, it should be possible to target our trading activities to encourage specific economic sectors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Approval Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_IconianApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
